name: Odor in the Court
description:
This game was written in 4 hours by two 12-year-olds and their dad!   It is our first game jam.

With the idea "Law and Order" we were thinking of silly things a judge might do with their gavel to create order in their life.  Sorting things seemed to make sense.  So that somehow turned into good and bad rats that had to be whacked with a gavel to send them to jail or set them free.

CREDITS

All artwork is original and was drawn by K. Haine using Krita.

All programming was done by C. Haine in Scratch v3.

Original music was written by P. Haine using Garage Band.

Audio samples were edited using Audacity.

Sound credits:

  • mixkit.co 
  • kenney.nl
  • freesound.org
